Pre-Game Insights: The White Sox (31-107) are set to take on the Orioles (79-59) in the first of a three-game series on September 2, 2024.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Orioles currently hold a commanding 4-0 lead in the season series against the White Sox.
Others: The game will begin at 3:05 p.m. EDT in Baltimore. The White Sox have struggled on the road, posting an abysmal 0-10 record in their last ten games, and are currently on a 10-game losing streak.
